Authors and Citation

Authors

  • Harry Thompson. Maintainer, author, copyright holder.

  • Dominik Moritz. Author.
    Rust original, <https://github.com/domoritz/line-density-rust>

  • The authors of the dependency Rust crates. Contributor.
    see inst/AUTHORS file for details

  • Hiroaki Yutani. Contributor.
    Scripts where noted, <https://yutannihilation.github.io/string2path>

Citation

Source: DESCRIPTION

Thompson H, Moritz D (2025). gglinedensity: Make DenseLines Heatmaps with 'ggplot2'. R package version 0.1.1.9000, https://github.com/hrryt/gglinedensity. 

@Manual{,
  title = {gglinedensity: Make DenseLines Heatmaps with 'ggplot2'},
  author = {Harry Thompson and Dominik Moritz},
  year = {2025},
  note = {R package version 0.1.1.9000},
  url = {https://github.com/hrryt/gglinedensity},
}
